name: Howard The Alien: Dance Sim
description: Create videos with Howard and share them on social networks! Have fun with your friends, combine different tracks and Howard's movements. Embed a new meme character in your environment with augmented reality technology! Metal alien Howard replaced the famous dance Dame Tu Cosita. Howard knows a lot of dances and has a lot of powerful music tracks at his disposal! Use the augmented reality button and The metal alien will dance in your room!
